text: Ara yadera amara dharmagrantha diyechi tara ananda bodha kare ya tomara kache abatirna hayeche tate, ara gotradera madhye emana'o ache ye era kichuta asbikara kare. Tumi balo -- ''nihsandeha ami adista hayechi ye ami allah‌ra'i upasana karabo ebam tamra sathe kona ansi damra karabo na. Tamra'i prati ami ahbana kari ebam tamra'i nikata amara pratyabartana.’’
